title: [Bard's Guild, Minstrel's Market]
description: Walls paneled in warm cherrywood hold a variety of instruments, quills, and parchment displayed like precious artifacts.  Intricate iron sconces, shaped like treble clefs, emit a soft, golden light, casting a welcoming glow over the polished wooden counter.  Behind it, an elderly bard tends to customers with a gentle smile.  The air is filled with the subtle scent of old paper and wood polish, mingling harmoniously with distant strains of music.
